website_summaries.verdict: QuickBooks online helps you keep track of accounting for your small business with an interface that is easy to understand and use.
pros: Multiple options for features depending on your business needs
cons: Some reports that tech support wasn't helpful in resolving issues

customer_reviews.title: Not what I ordered
customer_reviews.text: This is not the program. There was no disc no software at all. I'm not paying $189.00for the quickbooks reference guide
customer_reviews.author: Kelly Denise Mclean

customer_reviews.title: Nice upgrade from QB 2012
customer_reviews.text: Forced to upgrade from QB 2012. This version installed easily. Updated 2012 database easily. And interface is better than my previous version.
customer_reviews.author: CG03026

customer_reviews.title: For use in USA only.
customer_reviews.text: Product can not be installed outside of the USA. This information was not listed in the description.
customer_reviews.author: Frank Moore

customer_reviews.title: CD would not load.
customer_reviews.text: The CD would not load on my computer. Luckily my accountant was there and was able to download it manually. Don't know if it was a problem with the CD or my computer, but my computer has never had trouble before.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra Cauthon

customer_reviews.title: Easy to get up and running
customer_reviews.text: I would suggest having a bookkeeper or accountant set up your chart of accounts and link your payroll items to the proper expense accounts if you use this feature. I love QuickBooks and have used it for years, but it is easy for a novice to set up incorrectly or in an unhelpful format. The good news, it's also easy to resolve and put to rights if you've combined accounts in an unhelpful reporting maner. Setting up bank feeds can save a lot of time if you use credit cards extensively. The first usage takes a bit of time, but after that, it's smooth sailing.
customer_reviews.author: JJ. Kohl

customer_reviews.title: WTF is going on
customer_reviews.text: I don't know what is up with this program but it doesn't seem to be new. I'm trying to put in a username and password and it acts like I've already done this. When it said I had the info wrong it sent an email to some address I've never heard of, it was e...u@intrinsicarehealth.com. I'm in the bar business not health care. What gives? I am getting really pissed off. It came in a sealed case with a scratch off license number like it's supposed to. What the hell is going on? Don't buy!!
customer_reviews.author: David H

customer_reviews.title: No Help
customer_reviews.text: I needed a product with a checkbook account page. this product is apparently for business only. i went to seek help both chat and by live call.dead ended with the chat and on live call the background noise was so bad we could not communicate, i also had a hard time with the language barrier, i have to give up and return it as i cannot even talk to someone about their product that would work for me
customer_reviews.author: Twitchman

customer_reviews.title: Waste of money
customer_reviews.text: Updated from 2014 version to 2020 version cuz my accountant wanted me too. New version cost me over $200, but doesn't appear to be any different than old version.
customer_reviews.author: Jeanne

customer_reviews.title: THIS PRODUCT WILL TURN OFF YOUR PAYROLL SUBSCRIPTION
customer_reviews.text: Since I read in the description that, "Payroll and online features require Internet access (1 Mbps recommended speed)," I assumed that this product included a payroll subscription. As soon as I installed it, however, my payroll function was cancelled. When I called Quickbooks, they said I would have to pay $290 to turn it back on for the basic service, or $475 for the enhanced service. Quickbooks is almost impossible to get on the phone, and their tech support is terrible. Good luck. :(
customer_reviews.author: Monelle M. Richmond

customer_reviews.title: Windows10 new computer won't install QB2020
customer_reviews.text: Hours stretched in to days...now weeks...we still haven't been able to install QB2020 on our new computer. Techs are baffled. Will keep trying. Spent $200 for disc. QB2020 runs ok on 10-year-old computer but now I have 2 desktops to run in home office.
customer_reviews.author: R. Kraus

customer_reviews.title: Quick Books 2020 pro
customer_reviews.text: I understand some of the frustration with having to update a product. I had Quick Books 2017 Desktop and had to move to Desktop 2020 to be able to keep processing Credit Cards. It seems it would be easier for Quick Books to offer an upgrade fix at a lower cost. Then again look at your anti-virus program, you have to buy a new one of their upgrades every year, or should I say subscription. I had no problem with the install but then again I have been using QB since 2005.
customer_reviews.author: BRCINFAY

customer_reviews.title: To be able to utilize program with no added cost
customer_reviews.text: By not being able to download cd on my computer I had to download from internet and they are trying to state I need to pay more money... this was to be an up and running program. I am more than disappointed!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Veterans Outreach of Illinois

customer_reviews.title: DVD wouldn't load
customer_reviews.text: DVD wouldn't load. Fortunately a free download was available. I like to have the actual disc because one never knows when intuit might charge extra for re-downloads. The license key did work. Installation went fine from Pro 2017 to Pro 2020 on Windows 10 Pro. The new features were minimal. This every 3 year required upgrade is just what intuit likes to do. QB did break the importing of credit card transactions feature over the past year. That feature has never has worked right since. On a positive note, Quickbooks software works pretty well though for small business and assisted payroll (extra fees) makes things easy.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Won't run on My Windows 10
customer_reviews.text: I was unable to get it to run. It requires Internet Explorer. Worked with support for two hours. They gave up. Requires internet explorer 11. Was told to contact Microsoft. Per Microsoft Internet explorer is no longer supported. Will never run on an updated Windows 10.
customer_reviews.author: Carl

customer_reviews.title: Not working properly
customer_reviews.text: System is showing error, and customer support is not helping I waste my money.
customer_reviews.author: ISABEL MESA

customer_reviews.title: It works great once setup!
customer_reviews.text: This is the only bookkeeping software I have ever tried. I thought it would be easy to keep books with software that does everything for you. It’s definitely more complex then that. I had to hire someone to help me set it up. But it is what it is lol I’m not a pro and just need to learn more about bookkeeping. Software is great, glad I picked it. And you can buy checks and stuff for it way cheaper here on amazon
customer_reviews.author: Stryver

customer_reviews.title: Easy for first time users
customer_reviews.text: I have used QuickBooks for at least twenty years, maybe more. I did not find much difference in the 2020 version from my previous version but I needed the newer version. I find the on-line help very useful but don't need to use it much. However, my daughter has started using it with no bookkeeping experience and seems to be doing just fine. It is very user friendly and does not require accounting experience.
customer_reviews.author: Helen Tausch

customer_reviews.title: Upset that I had to purchase it
customer_reviews.text: I needed to buy it because the former version that I owned and paid for didn't support Windows 10. There should have been special upgrade price but instead I had to buy it as if I were a new customer.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Good book keeping software
customer_reviews.text: Intuit on purpose makes it so every three years you have to upgrade your version of quickbooks to use the online banking features. It's good software, but their support is horrible. The two times I called they made it worse and they have no idea what they are doing. They will claim they understand the issue and proceed to make the issue worse. One time they screwed up my books so much I opted just to start a new one from scratch.
customer_reviews.author: Michael W.

customer_reviews.title: have great product , have used for years
customer_reviews.text: had the 2015 software and decided to upgrade, I purchased the online, QuickBooks , what a nightmare, totally different from this hardware, I tried for 5 months, and could not get to get it to work similar as my regular QuickBooks, so it back to hand entry with a bank feed,
customer_reviews.author: Robin Boyd

customer_reviews.title: Takes time to learn, but seems worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Lots of things to learn. Seems really good overall. Premature to rank it a three star, I’m a solo LLC. and I think in the long run it’ll be a 5 star program. I’m just trying to learn it between everyday operations.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Alvarado

customer_reviews.title: Upgrade Not Worth It
customer_reviews.text: I was using an old 2015 version and decided it was time to update. It looks like my old version. Not sure I should have upgraded. Waste of $200.
customer_reviews.author: Hon. Scott H. McCoy

customer_reviews.title: No support or upgrades to the software because I purchased from Amazon
customer_reviews.text: I had to get a new computer so I had to get a new version of the software. After speaking to the support help at Intuit, they refused any help, support or upgrades unless I paid them an additional $499.00 per year. Amazon did nothing wrong but the info about the product does not tell you that Intuit will not help or support you because you purchased QB from Amazon
customer_reviews.author: Martha R Hammond

customer_reviews.title: NOT FOR BEGINNERS
customer_reviews.text: I have been using quickbooks from it's early beginning. Each new version is more complicated than the previous. The 2020 version follows that pattern. I have a degree in accounting and experience in the field. I can manage the changes but feel sorry for those who don't and try and use it for the first time. Get support is a real pain in the ?
customer_reviews.author: NICER THAN NICE

customer_reviews.title: Make sure you review the product before you purcase it what a scam QBO is
customer_reviews.text: I can't even find the gear icon I tried to send an invoice and it disappeared you can't even edit an invoice I even purchased a book for dummies and a cheat card I'm going to return This was a waste of 183.00 plus all the monies Ive spent paying to help set this impossible accounting up I wish i could get my money back what a waste of life and time!
customer_reviews.author: Shirley J.

customer_reviews.title: Best price out there!
customer_reviews.text: I am a one woman consulting firm and have to purchase all software and hardware for myself. This is the best price for Quickbooks and preferred by my accountant. I don't use all the bells and whistles but it gets the job done.
customer_reviews.author: Ann

customer_reviews.title: Software is ok. Consumer-friendliness is not.
customer_reviews.text: The software does the job, as it always has, however what once was a simple installation has become a task worthy of Microsoft's user UN-friendliness. 5/13/2020 note: I want to make it clear that this review was for the boxed (physical disc) version of Desktop Pro 2020, not any other version or platform or download, etc.
customer_reviews.author: cjgiam

customer_reviews.title: Crap software, no support
customer_reviews.text: This company is a piece of crap and like any other company that forces you to upgrade to the next piece of crap with its own new problems can cause heart attacks and the desire to ruin someone, like it has ruined you. Need I say more?
customer_reviews.author: dean

customer_reviews.title: Not worth the cheaper price unless you already know it all.  Tech will not help with this version
customer_reviews.text: Do not buy this version unless you need no help. Tech support will not help you because you did not buy the online version with support. This version is so it yourself, good luck. Not a problem if you know what you’re doing but quite annoying when you need help with an issue. For example trying to email invoices can be an issue if you use gmail or yahoo.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not the same software as is online
customer_reviews.text: I am already using QuickBooks online and I expected to get same but cheaper software by ordering QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2020 Accounting Software for Small Business with Amazon. After downloading and installing it I realized it is not the same software. Online is simple and transparent as well as very easy to use. Did return immediately to the nearest Amazon location and already waiting more than a month for my money back. ( Update: returned it on 08/23/2020 and today is 10/01/2020- No refund received).
customer_reviews.author: sadeta

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: It was composed of MDF and not real wood. Also the MDF was split. I would have preferred real wood. I sent photos of the cabinet and they credited my account without requiring it to be returned,
customer_reviews.author: gilaskh

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy!
customer_reviews.text: I was told this was user friendly. It is not!!! I've spent hours trying to figure it out. I've had people over to help me. I've watched tutorials and I still cannot get it to work for me. To get technical support I'm told I have to pay more money. A huge waste of my money.
customer_reviews.author: Valeria White

customer_reviews.title: So easy to install!
customer_reviews.text: From the time it arrived at my gate to complete installation was about 7 minutes!
customer_reviews.author: Wally Lacey

customer_reviews.title: Excited to use it
customer_reviews.text: Quickbooks seem to be a great way for tracking your small business books. Can't wait to transfer our file and get started. Shipping and packaging were great and installation was a breeze.
customer_reviews.author: Tammy

customer_reviews.title: could be better
customer_reviews.text: If Intuit had any real competition it would be out of business tomorrow. It's overly complex for the sake of it. However I have used it for decades because it is the standard of the industry and my clients expect it.
customer_reviews.author: Dennis

customer_reviews.title: Simple, user friendly system.
customer_reviews.text: Been using Quick Books in my business for years. Upgraded to the 2020 version. Easy to use' user friendly and totally complete for my wholesale business with 1000's of items.
customer_reviews.author: Carl Clark

customer_reviews.title: I was a dummy, but quickbooks has made me much smarter !
customer_reviews.text: I've used Quickbooks for over twenty years, and it keeps getting better. Best accounting software by far.
customer_reviews.author: Arlys Hannam

customer_reviews.title: Easy to use
customer_reviews.text: I worked with this program for years, always like something that makes my life easier. It was a no brainer to update to the new version.
customer_reviews.author: L. R

customer_reviews.title: Good program. Used it since 1998
customer_reviews.text: Updated my program from 1998 to 2020. It worked. No data lost
customer_reviews.author: Nj

customer_reviews.title: Better than the on line version
customer_reviews.text: I like some of the new features and wish I had some of the old ones back.
customer_reviews.author: sjhall

customer_reviews.title: QuickBooks is great!
customer_reviews.text: I have been running this program for about twenty years. It keeps getting better.
customer_reviews.author: HDL

customer_reviews.title: Easy installation.
customer_reviews.text: Product received was what was expected. Was easy to upgrade from previous 2012 version.
customer_reviews.author: JAM

customer_reviews.title: Using for years
customer_reviews.text: I've been using QuickBooks for years and I have always liked the desktop version.
customer_reviews.author: Mita Mia

customer_reviews.title: Easiest QuickBooks upgrade ever!!
customer_reviews.text: Upgraded from QB Pro 2015 without a hitch and within 15 minutes.....happy customer.
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Moik

customer_reviews.title: QuickBooks Whatever! More like SlowBooks
customer_reviews.text: For the money you pay for a program, and doesn’t come with a manual to operate. Then the program crashes after 6 months of using it. On top of it all it’s so stinking sensitive to every move or how it operates! To me it’s a complete waste of time and money.
customer_reviews.author: Nathan Johnson

customer_reviews.title: Not pro plus
customer_reviews.text: This version is great. Accidentally bought the pro plus version in 2018 and got billed each year for unnecessary upgrade. Unfortunately had to shut down because of coronavirus but would still recommend this software.
customer_reviews.author: REgg

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install. I am a long time user so also easy to use.
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install. I am a long time user so also easy to use.
customer_reviews.author: Sigilini

customer_reviews.title: A known problem
customer_reviews.text: Program loaded and installed on windows 10 , but would not open due to an error code 3371.could not validate key code lisc.. Jumped thru all the hoops and it still would not open. I am not a novice at the computer.
customer_reviews.author: Ron Brooks

customer_reviews.title: License and or  Product number is no good
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this item as an upgrade. the license number and/or product number is no good. It is unclear as to how to get a fix or replacement.
customer_reviews.author: yaketysmack

customer_reviews.title: Amazon and Quick Books are both prompt and reliable.
customer_reviews.text: I like the speed with which I received it. I use it to do the church books.
customer_reviews.author: Freedom Church

customer_reviews.title: QuickBooks
customer_reviews.text: The Quickbooks arrived on time and is a great value to bookkeeping!
customer_reviews.author: L. in Indiana

customer_reviews.title: Product key does not work!!
customer_reviews.text: My product key does not work. Can someone help me? I can't return it because it is past the date of return. Who can help me?
customer_reviews.author: Linda's Surface Pro

customer_reviews.title: Hard to learn
customer_reviews.text: It's my first time trying to use it and it's a very difficult program to learn
customer_reviews.author: RMS

customer_reviews.title: don't get conned
customer_reviews.text: worst accounting software ever Doesn't even come with a payroll module without paying extra Product packaging is misleading total waste of money
customer_reviews.author: treasure star properties fund inc

customer_reviews.title: Installed easily
customer_reviews.text: The software came with a cd making the install easy for me to perform. No problems what so ever.
customer_reviews.author: David Papiernik

customer_reviews.title: Your accounting practices will have to merge into QB's way of accounting.
customer_reviews.text: It is easy to use - once you know their vocabulary - and it is accurate and the data is available for tracking a variety of income - outgo results.
customer_reviews.author: New Revelations Collegiate Mission

customer_reviews.title: Good but old was as well.
customer_reviews.text: Good update. I liked 2012... need email option for invoice, that's why I had to update. Your support is useless!
customer_reviews.author: Patricia F.

customer_reviews.title: Affordable
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and price affordable. Have not yet used the tech support.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good way to do own bookkeeping
customer_reviews.text: Takes awhile to figure it out but easy way to keep books
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2020 Accounting Software for Small Business with Amazon Exclusive Shortcut Guide [PC Disc]
product_meta.description: Platform:1 User - PC Disc| Edition:ProQuickbooks desktop Pro helps you organize your business finances all in one place so you can be more productive. Simple to set up and use. Stay on Top of invoices, manage expenses, get reliable reports for tax time and import your data from a spreadsheet.1 have questions? Step-by-step tutorials show you how to create invoices, record expenses, and more. Pro 2020 also helps you get paid faster than ever with new tools, like automated payment reminders.
feature_bullets: Desktop Pro helps you organize your business finances all in one place so you can be more productive
Step-by-step tutorials show you how to create invoices, record expenses, and more
Get information you need with easy-to-use reports
New get paid faster by automatically reminding customers when payments are due
New Facilitate quicker payments by enabling customers to easily search for invoice emails by PO numbers
New Simplify customer payment processing by consolidating multiple invoices into just one email
Save time with improved navigation through reports with jobs & classes
Improve cash flow by giving customers increased visibility of their full balance owed
Exclusively at Amazon, QuickBooks Desktop Pro 2020 includes the new Keyboard Shortcut Guide to make your accounting easier and faster in order to save you time and money
Simple to setup and use- No Accounting Knowledge necessary Stay on top of invoices, manage expenses, get reliable reports for tax time and import your data from a spreadsheet

specifications.Customer Reviews: /** Fix for UDP-1061. Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
